function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of clear guidance on virus propagation prevention measures in the built environment","Impact":"Increased risk of virus transmission and spread within the built environment","Mitigation":"Develop clear and comprehensive guidelines for virus propagation prevention measures in building design and maintenance","Technologies":"Use of advanced air filtration systems, antimicrobial surfaces, and ultraviolet disinfection technology","People":"Occupants of built environments, facilities managers, building designers, public health authorities","Owner":"Public health authorities, building designers, facilities managers"},{"Description":"Incomplete addressing of PVP2 in the WELL criteria","Impact":"Potential gaps in preventing virus propagation through unaddressed factors in the built environment","Mitigation":"Conduct further research to identify and implement PVP2 measures in building design standards and regulations","Technologies":"Use of advanced air purification systems, emphasis on ventilation and air circulation, implementation of HEPA filters","People":"Building designers, architects, public health authorities","Owner":"Building designers, public health authorities"},{"Description":"Insufficient response to the PVP5 indicator in the WELL criteria","Impact":"Limited focus on the role of natural light in virus propagation prevention within the built environment","Mitigation":"Include specific guidelines on the use of natural light and window design to minimize virus transmission and support occupants' wellness","Technologies":"Integration of daylighting systems, use of responsive window technology, incorporation of UV light disinfection in naturally lit areas","People":"Architects, building designers, public health authorities","Owner":"Architects, building designers, public health authorities"}]}
